title: Multiplayer Sleeping
description: Adds multiplayer sleeping functionality by allowing time to be passed without requring all online players to be sleeping in beds
description_short: Pass nighttime without requring all online players to be sleeping

features.label: Allows players to sleep through the night when 25% of online players (In the overworld) are sleeping
Compatible with AFK Detector datapack to ignore players who are online but not active
Chat message announces require player count to pass night as well as button to kick sleeping players if night is required
Clears rain and thunderstorms without distrupting natural in-game weather cycle
